website_summaries.verdict: This unique, counter height dining table features a beautiful gently weathered pine wood finish that is perfect for anyone who wants a rustic table at home.
pros: The measurements of 30 inches by 60 inches by 36 inches make it practical for many homes
cons: Some have said the surface scratches easily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Fragile - Don’t Look Too Closely!
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with this table - It was easy to assemble, and sturdy. There was a splintering of a top edge of our table upon arrival that we had to contend with, but we have solved any future issues by ordering a custom glass top for it from a local vendor to protect the easily-compromised tabletop finish. Otherwise, we are very pleased with it. UPDATE: Less than three months in, and two of the legs are splitting apart - I can fit a credit card in these cracks. We’ve done our best to treat this table with kid gloves, covering the top with glass, and going easy on it in general. What are my warranty options, Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: MvG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this table! Beautiful dark color, sturdy design, and perfect bar height. It came quicker than expected, easy to assemble, and looks amazing. HIGHLY recommend for the price! Only giving sturdiness a 4/5 because the center piece at the base bends a bit, so we just don’t apply pressure to it. Otherwise, it’s very sturdy! I read about how malleable the wood is so we are careful not to place any objects that could damage the wood. There are 3 staple-shaped lines in each of the pieces, which could have been storage damage or just product design, but I don’t mind them at all!
customer_reviews.author: Lizabelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, sturdy bar height table.
customer_reviews.text: This table is HEAVY. It was surprisingly easy to put together though. The instructions recommended two people assemble it, but I did it fairly easily on my own, and Im a 56 year old grandma. Setting it upright or moving the box requires two people though. I cant comment on it’s durability as I haven't had it long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid, mine had some flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very sturdy. Some of the prefab female gussets where installed improperly at wrong angles and depths. Which made some assembly difficult and had to be forced. Some of the hardware protruded and cracked the wood. Customer service through am amazon handled that.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Swogger

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but had some damages
customer_reviews.text: I was little disappointed that box was damage but we put it together anyway however once we started we notice bottom piece wouldn't fit in the slots so my husband filed down the edges on thee one side that wouldn't go in then after putting it together notice one side of top table had a small dent and one leg had a scrape other then that I love the look and size of this table very nice, word up make sure box isn't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table! Originally the one we received was cracked but we contacted customer service and they got a new one quickly and arranged for the pickup of the broken one. The table is well made and small enough to be versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Nicklas

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but a tool to assemble!;)
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice piece of furniture. Especially for price. I will say putting it together with the little ratchet was infuriating. Go out buy the larger version of the hexagon tool with a handle. At one point I had to put gloves on as my fingers were raw:(. But once your past that, it’s pretty good;)
customer_reviews.author: Park City Concierge

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolute garbage. Came broken and you can tell it was assembled with broken pieces straight from the factory. Components that were broken couldn't have been damaged during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Pros- the table is sturdy, durable, and has beautiful wood grain detail. I would definitely recommend to others. It is a true bar height, making a perfect conversation set for our finished basement entertainment area. Cons- the tools provided to insert the screws will take you a while. My husband used an Allen wrench bit on his impact driver to quickly assemble since not all of the holes lined up perfectly. The box was also extremely damaged upon arrival, but all pieces were intact and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Katie White

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Search for Best Price
customer_reviews.text: This table arrived on time and though well pack in the box, there was a small piece of wood that broke off. I would consider returning it on principle alone but the table's easy to set up, beautiful and sturdy. We are pleased with the product but recommend price searching. Amazon discounted the table the very next day to 265 and would not price match themselves. Given the availability of this time and Amazon's draconian rules, shop around. The table is worth it and you can use the savings on accessories for your new table.
customer_reviews.author: D. Toone

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this table. Perfectly tall and sturdy. Not too bad to assemble if you have a drill and Allen head bits to screw in the bolts, just make sure you put the drill on a pretty low setting so you don’t risk breaking anything. The table was very well packed and I had no scuffs or worn/rubbed off finish.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hunting for
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for this table - very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, bad finish
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great in the product description, but is cheaply made. There is an inset groove along the edge that catches crumbs. We've had ours for 2 months and the finish is chipping off in places and has even been rubbed off with cleaning. The bottom brace is not a solid piece of wood so I anticipate my toddler breaking it soon. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: TestTaker

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable to use and sit at.
customer_reviews.text: We love the height of the table. It is higher than counter height and we use tall bar stools to sit in while eating.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Servo and Crow

customer_reviews.title: Really nice piece for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived quickly, and looks nice. Assembly was easy. But get some help if possible because the box was quite heavy as is the assembled table. Really like the look. My apartment is slowly coming together. I would purchase this piece again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: We received a replacement table within three days. It easy to assemble. It’s strong. Definitely love the height and size
customer_reviews.author: Richard Clayborn Boykin 2nd

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Tables looks great. Was easy to assemble and looks just like pictures . My only complaint is there are broken pieces under the table. It came out of the box like this. Some legs have minor scratches as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Not good experience
customer_reviews.text: Broken was not able to assemble; had to purchase locally.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald j Mcdowell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table and great color. Easy to put together and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be a soft wood. Dents easily from chairs. Overall good table
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Only wish they had one for lower bar stools. Only option was this 42” height so now I have to cut it down by 6”! Otherwise good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K. Belsheim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy. Bought matching chairs. Everything was easy to assemble and looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Shonda

customer_reviews.title: the product came damaged
customer_reviews.text: The Box had a big hole in the box and 1 of the legs is smashed in on 3 places
customer_reviews.author: Pjm

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great standing desk. Put high bar stools with it for when we want to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Added addition to the man cave! Great height behind theatre chairs
customer_reviews.author: Alan Suggs

customer_reviews.title: VERY stout, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a podcasting table, and it has the perfect edge lip for that. nice brown color, very sturdy solid wood construction. only has a total of like 6 pieces to assemble. Over all very happy with it, exactly what I was hoping for looking at photos of various bar height tables online.
customer_reviews.author: Erik A. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Soft wood damaged in transit
customer_reviews.text: Table legs were damaged in packaging. Silica bead bag broke in transit and the beads made little dents all over the wood. Wood is soft and is covered with a vaneer. I'm sure this table will not look well for long. Wouldn't recommend for main dining or desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley Drewing Bar Height Table, Brown
product_meta.description: Raise the bar on modern farmhouse style with the drewing rectangular bar table. Its clean-lined good looks are accentuated with bold, blocky legs and stretcher profile for a substantial look and feel. The tables wire-brushed finish infuses a relaxed, rustic sense of ease.
feature_bullets: BAR HEIGHT DINING ROOM TABLE: This table's deep brown, clean lines and stretcher profile don loads of farmhouse flair. Everyone, kids included, will love gathering around come meal time
HANDSOMELY CRAFTED: Made of veneers, wood and engineered wood
DISTRESSED DETAILS: The wire-brushed finish combined with the bold, blocky legs makes for a wonderfully rustic design that sets perfectly in any bistro or spacious dining room
SEATING FOR 4: Invite friends or family to gather around for a dinner party or a lazy breakfast in the kitchen on Sunday. This pub height table measures 60" W x 30" D x 42" H
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, tools and hardware included. Matching bar stools available, sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars65 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
